function.name: Awake
function.description: Awake is called when the script instance is being loaded.

function.name: FixedUpdate
function.description: This function is called every fixed framerate frame, if the MonoBehaviour is enabled.

function.name: LateUpdate
function.description: LateUpdate is called every frame, if the Behaviour is enabled.

function.name: OnAnimatorIK
function.description: Callback for setting up animation IK (inverse kinematics).

function.name: OnAnimatorMove
function.description: Callback for processing animation movements for modifying root motion.

function.name: OnApplicationFocus
function.description: Sent to all game objects when the player gets or loses focus.

function.name: OnApplicationPause
function.description: Sent to all game objects when the player pauses.

function.name: OnApplicationQuit
function.description: Sent to all game objects before the application is quit.

function.name: OnAudioFilterRead
function.description: If OnAudioFilterRead is implemented, Unity will insert a custom filter into the audio DSP chain.

function.name: OnBecameInvisible
function.description: OnBecameInvisible is called when the renderer is no longer visible by any camera.

function.name: OnBecameVisible
function.description: OnBecameVisible is called when the renderer became visible by any camera.

function.name: OnCollisionEnter
function.description: OnCollisionEnter is called when this collider/rigidbody has begun touching another rigidbody/collider.

function.name: OnCollisionEnter2D
function.description: Sent when an incoming collider makes contact with this object's collider (2D physics only).

function.name: OnCollisionExit
function.description: OnCollisionEnter is called when this collider/rigidbody has stopped touching another rigidbody/collider.

function.name: OnCollisionExit2D
function.description: Sent when a collider on another object stops touching this object's collider (2D physics only).

function.name: OnCollisionStay
function.description: OnCollisionEnter is called once per frame for every collider/rigidbody that is touching rigidbody/collider.

function.name: OnCollisionStay2D
function.description: Sent each frame where a collider on another object is touching this object's collider (2D physics only).

function.name: OnConnectedToServer
function.description: Called on the client when you have successfully connected to a server

function.name: OnControllerColliderHit
function.description: OnControllerColliderHit is called when the controller hits a collider while performing a Move.

function.name: OnDestroy
function.description: This function is called when the MonoBehaviour will be destroyed.

function.name: OnDisable
function.description: This function is called when the behaviour becomes disabled () or inactive.

function.name: OnDisconnectedFromServer
function.description: Called on the client when the connection was lost or you disconnected from the server.

function.name: OnDrawGizmos
function.description: Implement this OnDrawGizmos if you want to draw gizmos that are also pickable and always drawn.

function.name: OnDrawGizmosSelected
function.description: Implement this OnDrawGizmosSelected if you want to draw gizmos only if the object is selected.

function.name: OnEnable
function.description: This function is called when the object becomes enabled and active.

function.name: OnFailedToConnect
function.description: Called on the client when a connection attempt fails for some reason.

function.name: OnFailedToConnectToMasterServer
function.description: Called on clients or servers when there is a problem connecting to the master server.

function.name: OnGUI
function.description: OnGUI is called for rendering and handling GUI events.

function.name: OnJointBreak
function.description: Called when a joint attached to the same game object broke.

function.name: OnLevelWasLoaded
function.description: This function is called after a new level was loaded.

function.name: OnMasterServerEvent
function.description: Called on clients or servers when reporting events from the MasterServer.

function.name: OnMouseDown
function.description: OnMouseDown is called when the user has pressed the mouse button while over the GUIElement or Collider.

function.name: OnMouseDrag
function.description: OnMouseDrag is called when the user has clicked on a GUIElement or Collider and is still holding down the mouse.

function.name: OnMouseEnter
function.description: OnMouseEnter is called when the mouse entered the GUIElement or Collider.

function.name: OnMouseExit
function.description: OnMouseExit is called when the mouse is not any longer over the GUIElement or Collider.

function.name: OnMouseOver
function.description: OnMouseOver is called every frame while the mouse is over the GUIElement or Collider.

function.name: OnMouseUp
function.description: OnMouseUp is called when the user has released the mouse button.

function.name: OnMouseUpAsButton
function.description: OnMouseUpAsButton is only called when the mouse is released over the same GUIElement or Collider as it was pressed.

function.name: OnNetworkInstantiate
function.description: Called on objects which have been network instantiated with Network.Instantiate

function.name: OnParticleCollision
function.description: OnParticleCollision is called when a particle hits a collider.

function.name: OnPlayerConnected
function.description: Called on the server whenever a new player has successfully connected.

function.name: OnPlayerDisconnected
function.description: Called on the server whenever a player disconnected from the server.

function.name: OnPostRender
function.description: OnPostRender is called after a camera finished rendering the scene.

function.name: OnPreCull
function.description: OnPreCull is called before a camera culls the scene.

function.name: OnPreRender
function.description: OnPreRender is called before a camera starts rendering the scene.

function.name: OnRenderImage
function.description: OnRenderImage is called after all rendering is complete to render image.

function.name: OnRenderObject
function.description: OnRenderObject is used to render your own objects using Graphics.DrawMesh or other functions.

function.name: OnSerializeNetworkView
function.description: Used to customize synchronization of variables in a script watched by a network view.

function.name: OnServerInitialized
function.description: Called on the server whenever a Network.InitializeServer was invoked and has completed.

function.name: OnTransformChildrenChanged
function.description: This function is called when the list of children of the transform of the GameObject has changed.

function.name: OnTransformParentChanged
function.description: This function is called when the parent property of the transform of the GameObject has changed.

function.name: OnTriggerEnter
function.description: OnTriggerEnter is called when the Collider other enters the trigger.

function.name: OnTriggerEnter2D
function.description: Sent when another object enters a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).

function.name: OnTriggerExit
function.description: OnTriggerExit is called when the Collider other has stopped touching the trigger.

function.name: OnTriggerExit2D
function.description: Sent when another object leaves a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).

function.name: OnTriggerStay
function.description: OnTriggerStay is called once per frame for every Collider other that is touching the trigger.

function.name: OnTriggerStay2D
function.description: Sent each frame where another object is within a trigger collider attached to this object (2D physics only).

function.name: OnValidate
function.description: This function is called when the script is loaded or a value is changed in the inspector (Called in the editor only).

function.name: OnWillRenderObject
function.description: OnWillRenderObject is called once for each camera if the object is visible.

function.name: Reset
function.description: Reset to default values.

function.name: Start
function.description: Start is called just before any of the Update methods is called the first time.

function.name: Update
function.description: Update is called every frame, if the MonoBehaviour is enabled.
